high_signal_items.title: Insider Purchase Signals in Microcap Equities: Gradient Boosting Detection of Abnormal Returns
high_signal_items.why_it_matters: This paper identifies a momentum pattern in insider purchases of microcap stocks, suggesting a potential trading strategy based on insider activity and price movements. The use of machine learning to predict abnormal returns provides a novel approach to exploiting inefficiencies in illiquid markets.

high_signal_items.title: Explainable Patterns in Cryptocurrency Microstructure
high_signal_items.why_it_matters: The study reveals stable cross-asset patterns in cryptocurrency order books, suggesting a portable microstructure representation for short-horizon returns. This could lead to the development of universal feature libraries for crypto markets, enhancing trading strategies across different assets.

high_signal_items.title: Generative AI for Stock Selection
high_signal_items.why_it_matters: The use of generative AI for feature discovery in stock selection demonstrates significant improvements in Sharpe ratios, indicating that AI-generated features can enhance traditional trading models and reduce manual feature engineering.

new_agent_ideas.edge_hypothesis: Insider purchases in microcap stocks following a price appreciation signal further positive returns due to slower information incorporation in illiquid markets.
new_agent_ideas.test_plan: Backtest using historical insider purchase data and price movements to validate momentum strategy.

new_agent_ideas.edge_hypothesis: Stable cross-asset patterns in cryptocurrency order books can be exploited for arbitrage opportunities across different crypto assets.
new_agent_ideas.test_plan: Implement a backtest using historical order book data to identify arbitrage opportunities based on identified patterns.

new_agent_ideas.edge_hypothesis: AI-generated features provide unique insights that are weakly correlated with traditional features, offering a new dimension for stock selection.
new_agent_ideas.test_plan: Integrate AI-generated features into existing stock selection models and evaluate performance improvements.

new_data_sources.name: SEC Form 4 Filings
new_data_sources.use_case: To track insider trading activities for potential momentum strategies in microcap equities.

new_data_sources.name: Binance Futures Order Book Data
new_data_sources.use_case: To analyze cross-asset patterns in cryptocurrency microstructure for arbitrage opportunities.

new_data_sources.name: Analyst and Options Data
new_data_sources.use_case: To generate AI-driven features for enhanced stock selection strategies.
